page.content:
The main industries of the survey area are{coal mining}and the{Coalite works, providing a total of about{4,500 jobs.
{COAL MINING Bolsover and Markham are the 2 collieries in the area. In addition to coal mining, there are a number of workshops at Markham providing equipment for the industry. The N.C.B. has recently approved a Â£20,000,000 scheme to create a new drift mine at Markham, providing 400 new jobs and increasing output by 200,000 tonnes.
{COALITE p.l.c. The Coalite company's works and offices are situated between Bolsover and Markham collieries. A chemical refinery, solid fuel plant, transport department and the head offices are all based at the Bolsover site.
